channel.title: icon on Blowfish
channel.description: Recent content in icon on Blowfish

item.title: Shortcodes
item.description: In addition to all the default Hugo shortcodes, Congo adds a few extras for additional functionality. Alert # alert outputs its contents as a stylised message box within your article. It’s useful for drawing attention to important information that you don’t want the reader to miss.

item.title: Partials
item.description: Analytics # Congo provides built-in support for Fathom Analytics and Google Analytics. Fathom is a paid alternative to Google Analytics that respects user privacy. If you’re interested you can use this affiliate link to receive $10 credit and try the service.
